name: nfc
condition: if(shortcutLaunched == true && shortcutValue == 'NFC'&& hw.isNfcEnabled() == false){(ui.showShortToast("打开NFC🌈🌈🌈") + hw.enableNfc())}else if (shortcutLaunched == true && shortcutValue == "NFC"&& hw.isNfcEnabled() == true) {(ui.showShortToast("关闭NFC🙅🙅🙅")+hw.disableNfc())}
actions: ui.showLongToast("开关切换操作执行完成");
